    Class Description
    AssetRefConverter  
    CallURL  
    ClasspathUtil
    Contains utility methods for validating the CLASSPATH of a runtime environment and determining which version of a class will be loaded.
    CodeUtil  
    DesignatedHostSslVerifier
    Enables SSL trust of a specific hostname or IP with a self-signed certificate as long as the CN equals the trusted host.
    ExpressionUtil  
    HmacSha1Signature  
    HttpAltConnection
    Uses the Apache HTTP Client (supports PATCH).
    HttpConnection
    Wraps an HttpURLConnection to support non-standard methods like PATCH.
    HttpHelper
    Utility for invoking HTTP requests.
    HttpRequest
    Models an HttpRequest.
    HttpResponse  
    JMSServices  
    JsonUtil
    Helper methods and access to JSON configuration values.
    MDWMessageCreator
    Provides a easier method to create a MessageCreator object for use with a JmsTemplate
